Text:
Audio works, but the video is absolute crap. It's a completely grey screen with bits of pixelation that comes through, and this was using VLC.

Don't waste your time with this one.

Hi, the quality of this release is exactly what you see in the screnshots.
The film is full of scratches, as you can see particulary in the last but one screen (the one with Tarantino), but is an effect wanted from director.
